Richard Puccarelli

February 4, 2026 (Re-org Meeting)

The Open Space Committee consists of 11 members: Mayor/Planner; 2 Township Council members (one year term); 4 Township residents appointed by Council for 3 year terms (except initial); 3 Township residents appointed by Mayor for 3 year terms (except initial). In addition to membership, there will be a non-voting member from the Environmental Commission.
